scripts.build: npm run build:dist && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir release/web
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:dist && mkdir -p release/chrome && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir release/chrome --filename hister-chrome.zip
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:dist && mkdir -p release/firefox && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir release/firefox --filename hister-firefox.xpi
scripts.build:safari: npm run build:dist && xcrun safari-web-extension-packager dist --project-location ./safari-app --swift --macos-only --no-open --no-prompt --force && xcodebuild -project safari-app/Hister/Hister.xcodeproj -scheme Hister -configuration Release -derivedDataPath safari-app/Hister/build clean build CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY=- && mkdir -p release/safari && cp -R safari-app/Hister/build/Build/Products/Release/Hister.app release/safari/ && cd dist && zip -r ../release/safari/hister-dist.zip * && cd ../release/safari && zip -r Hister.app.zip Hister.app
